Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, near the Southern Entrance to town.
Room.LongDescription: There is a large inn to the east of Main Street called "The Golden Dolphin Inn", which caters to the average traveler travelling between cities. The modest accomodations and excellent food are well worth the few gold pieces it costs to stay there. Heading north on Main brings you towards the shopping districts of town, where just about anything may be bought or sold.
